cards.title: Scarlet X
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power now
Destroy a Hero Equipment. That Hero deals 1 Villain target 2 Projectile damage.
One Hero may draw a card now

openingLines.RedHoodCharacter: I cast aside the name! [b]You[/b] are the real monster here!

cards.title: Moonbeam
body: Increase damage dealt by Scarlet X by 1

flavorQuotes.text: The Moon shines, even in the dark.

cards.title: Argent Light Quiver
body: At the Start of your turn, you may move an Arrow from your trash into play

flavorQuotes.text: A drop of Moonlight to vanquish evil

cards.title: The Scarlet Mantle
body: Reduce damage dealt to Scarlet X by 1

flavorQuotes.text: It was then I decided I could{BR}bear the hood no more.

cards.title: Silver Arrow
body: When this card is destroyed, {ScarletX} deals 1 target 3 Projectile damage.

cards.title: Debilitating Arrow
body: When this card is destroyed, Scarlet X deals 1 target 1 Projectile damage.
Reduce damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of Scarlet X's next turn

cards.title: Sapping Arrow
body: When this card is destroyed, destroy a Villain Ongoing or Device card, then Scarlet X deals the owner of that card 2 Projectile damage.
cards.flavorText: Technology can be a monster too

cards.title: Detonation Arrow
body: When this card is destroyed, Scarlet X deals 1 target 2 Projectile damage, then she may deal up to 3 targets 1 Fire damage each.

cards.title: Call On The Light
body: Search for {Moonbeam} and put it into play.
You may play an Arrow card now.

flavorQuotes.text: As the moon is the only light{BR}So too will I stand in the night

cards.title: Quickest Draw
body: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put any revealed Arrows into play, and put the rest into your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: Where did that arrow come from?{BR}Where did [b]you[/b] come from?

cards.title: Restock
body: Shuffle your trash into your deck, then reveal cards until you reveal 2 Arrows. Put the Arrows into play, shuffle the remaining cards back into your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Just need a moment to fabricate{BR}some more arrows.

cards.title: Hunter's Instinct
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a One-Shot and put it into your hand.
You may play a One-Shot now.

cards.title: Anticipate the Need
body: At the Start of your turn, you may draw a card.
At the End of your turn, you may destroy this card to draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Where is... oh... thank you, Marion.

cards.title: Between the Shots
body: At the End of Scarlet X's turn, if there were no cards destroyed this turn, she regains 2 HP

cards.title: Waste Not, Want Not
body: When Scarlet X destroys a target, you may search the trash for an Arrow and put it into play.
cards.flavorText: Like any hunter, make{BR}efficient use of your ammunition

cards.title: Skilled Markswoman
body: You may play an additonal card on your play phase.
